tweet_text: In 2015, the #CharlestownLoophole allowed someone w/ a criminal history to buy a gun, and that gun was used in a mass shooting that took 9 innocent lives. I voted yes on #HR1446 because we must close the background check loophole that allows guns to fall into dangerous hands!
